comprehensiveGuide: Click <1>here</1> for a more comprehensive guide to what Ansari can do.
newConversationConfirmation: Are you certain that you want to begin a new conversation?
conversationLostWarning: Please note that the previous conversation will be lost.
backendErrorMessage: Something went wrong. If this issue persists please contact us through our help center at <1>{{email}}</1>
cantChangeLanguageWhileAnsariWritingAler: You can't change language before get Ansari response
whyDidYouChooseThisRating: Why did you choose this rating?
guestWelcomeMessage:
Hello and Salam! Welcome to Ansari. Ansari is an Islamic AI Assistant – a tool to help non-Muslims understand Islam and Muslims practice their faith more effectively. If you’d like a more comprehensive guide about what it can do, check out this <1>part of the documentation</1>.

Ansari is still experimental and may not always give correct results. If you have any feedback – positive or negative – don’t hesitate to use the thumbs up or thumbs down buttons, or if it’s more complex and you want a response, send us an email at <2>{{email}}</2>.

You are currently logged in as a guest. You can use guest mode for as long as you like, but some of Ansari’s features (e.g. saved conversations) are only available if you are signed in. You can register for a <3>new account</3>.

Subscribe for updates <4>here</4>!
welcomeMessage:
Hello and Salam! Welcome to Ansari. Ansari is an Islamic AI Assistant – a tool to help non-Muslims understand Islam and Muslims practice their faith more effectively. If you’d like a more comprehensive guide about what it can do, check out this <1>part of the documentation</1>.

Ansari is still experimental and may not always give correct results. If you have any feedback – positive or negative – don’t hesitate to use the thumbs up or thumbs down buttons, or if it’s more complex and you want a response, send us an email at <2>{{email}}</2>.
deleteAccountMessage: This action is irreversible. All your data, including chat history, will be permanently deleted.
authorizedFooterText: Ansari can make mistakes. Consider consulting a qualified Islamic Scholar.

share.title: Share link to Chat
share.message: Messages you send after creating your link won't be shared. Anyone with the URL will be able to view the shared chat.
share.successCopy: Copied shared conversation URL to clipboard!

notfoundMessage: The page could not be found.
updateRequiredDescription: A new version is required to continue using Ansari Chat. Please update now.
updateAvailableDescription: A new version of Ansari Chat is available with new features and improvements.
